oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: George Hamilton IV Performance - Tape 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 1 of 7. Recording of George Hamilton IV and the Country Gentlemen (performance group) on March 21, 1953.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen; Serenaders
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Beer, Wine, Whiskey (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (01:36) Sleepin' at the Foot of the Bed (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (03:05) Just Married (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (04:35) Hey Joe (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (05:35) Condemned (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (07:35) Caribbean (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (09:32) Satisfaction (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (12:10) Mama (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (14:28) Cry, Cry Darling -- (15:37) Ruby (Serenaders) -- (17:55) Even Though (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (20:08) Help Cat Baby (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (21:52) Old Man Blues (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (24:58) Amazing Grace (Serenaders) -- (26:12) Lucy (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (28:36) Two of Us (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen)
